config_files.docker-compose.yml:
version: '3'
services:
  snack:
    build: ./snack
    command: /go/bin/snack
    ports:
      - "8083:8083"
    environment:
      - TEMPLATE_DIR=/go/src/github.com/tilt-dev/servantes/snack/web/templates
  spoonerisms:
    build:
      context: ./spoonerisms
      dockerfile: ../Dockerfile.js.base
    command: sh -c "yarn --cwd /app install && node /app/index.js"
    volumes:
      - ./spoonerisms/src:/app
      - ./spoonerisms/package.json:/app/package.json
      - ./spoonerisms/yarn.lock:/app/yarn.lock
    ports:
      - "9006:5000"
  vigoda:
    image: vigoda_for_dc
    ports:
      - "9007:8081"
    environment:
      - TEMPLATE_DIR=/go/src/github.com/tilt-dev/servantes/vigoda/web/templates
  fortune:
    image: fortune_for_dc
    ports:
      - "9008:8082"
    environment:
      - TEMPLATE_DIR=/go/src/github.com/tilt-dev/servantes/fortune/web/templates
config_files.tilt_modules/restart_process/Dockerfile:
FROM alpine/git

RUN apk update && apk add make
RUN apk add build-base

RUN git clone https://github.com/eradman/entr.git /entr
WORKDIR /entr
RUN git checkout c564e6bdca1dfe2177d1224363cad734158863ad
RUN ./configure; CFLAGS="-static" make install

FROM scratch

COPY --from=0  /usr/local/bin/entr /

ADD tilt-restart-wrapper /
config_files..circleci/config.yml:
version: 2.1
jobs:
  build:
    docker:
      - image: tiltdev/tilt:latest
    working_directory: /root/go/src/github.com/tilt-dev/servantes

    steps:
      - checkout
      - setup_remote_docker:
          version: 19.03.12
      - run: apt update && apt install -y unzip time make wget m4 build-essential golang
      - run: |
          set -ex
          export PROTOC_VERSION="3.5.1"
          wget https://github.com/google/protobuf/releases/download/v${PROTOC_VERSION}/protoc-${PROTOC_VERSION}-linux-x86_64.zip && \
            unzip protoc-${PROTOC_VERSION}-linux-x86_64.zip -d protoc && \
            mv protoc/bin/protoc /usr/bin/protoc

      - run: echo 'export PATH=~/go/bin:$PATH' >> $BASH_ENV
      - run: cd .. && go get github.com/golang/protobuf/protoc-gen-go
      - run: make test
          
      - run: ctlptl create cluster kind --registry=ctlptl-registry && make integration
